00040 int decode_charset(const char *charset) {
00041   std::string tmp = charset;
00042   toLower(&tmp);
00043   if (tmp == "sjis"  || tmp == "shift-jis" ||
00044       tmp == "shift_jis" || tmp == "cp932")
00045     return CP932;
00046   else if (tmp == "euc"   || tmp == "euc_jp" ||
00047            tmp == "euc-jp")
00048     return EUC_JP;
00049   else if (tmp == "utf8" || tmp == "utf_8" ||
00050            tmp == "utf-8")
00051     return UTF8;
00052   else if (tmp == "utf16" || tmp == "utf_16" ||
00053            tmp == "utf-16")
00054     return UTF16;
00055   else if (tmp == "utf16be" || tmp == "utf_16be" ||
00056            tmp == "utf-16be")
00057     return UTF16BE;
00058   else if (tmp == "utf16le" || tmp == "utf_16le" ||
00059            tmp == "utf-16le")
00060     return UTF16LE;
00061   else if (tmp == "ascii")
00062     return ASCII;
00063 
00064   return UTF8;  // default is UTF8
00065 }
00066 
00067 std::string create_filename(const std::string &path,
00068                             const std::string &file) {
00069   std::string s = path;
00070 #if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(__CYGWIN__)
00071   if (s.size() && s[s.size()-1] != '\\') s += '\\';
00072 #else
00073   if (s.size() && s[s.size()-1] != '/') s += '/';
00074 #endif
00075   s += file;
00076   return s;
00077 }
00078 
00079 void remove_filename(std::string *s) {
00080   int len = static_cast<int>(s->size()) - 1;
00081   bool ok = false;
00082   for (; len >= 0; --len) {
00083 #if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(__CYGWIN__)
00084     if ((*s)[len] == '\\') {
00085       ok = true;
00086       break;
00087     }
00088 #else
00089     if ((*s)[len] == '/')  {
00090       ok = true;
00091       break;
00092     }
00093 #endif
00094   }
00095   if (ok)
00096     *s = s->substr(0, len);
00097   else
00098     *s = ".";
00099 }
00100 
00101 void remove_pathname(std::string *s) {
00102   int len = static_cast<int>(s->size()) - 1;
00103   bool ok = false;
00104   for (; len >= 0; --len) {
00105 #if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(__CYGWIN__)
00106     if ((*s)[len] == '\\') {
00107       ok = true;
00108       break;
00109     }
00110 #else
00111     if ((*s)[len] == '/')  {
00112       ok = true;
00113       break;
00114     }
00115 #endif
00116   }
00117   if (ok)
00118     *s = s->substr(len + 1, s->size() - len);
00119   else
00120     *s = ".";
00121 }
00122 
00123 void replace_string(std::string *s,
00124                     const std::string &src,
00125                     const std::string &dst) {
00126   size_t pos = s->find(src);
00127   if (pos != std::string::npos)
00128     s->replace(pos, src.size(), dst);
00129 }

00131 void enum_csv_dictionaries(const char *path,
00132                            std::vector<std::string> *dics) {
00133   dics->clear();
00134 
00135 #if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(__CYGWIN__)
00136   WIN32_FIND_DATA wfd;
00137   HANDLE hFind;
00138   const std::string pat = create_filename(path, "*.csv");
00139   hFind = FindFirstFile(pat.c_str(), &wfd);
00140   CHECK_DIE(hFind != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE)
00141       << "Invalid File Handle. Get Last Error reports";
00142   do {
00143     std::string tmp = create_filename(path, wfd.cFileName);
00144     dics->push_back(tmp);
00145   } while (FindNextFile(hFind, &wfd));
00146   FindClose(hFind);
00147 #else
00148   DIR *dir = opendir(path);
00149   CHECK_DIE(dir) << "no such directory: " << path;
00150 
00151   for (struct dirent *dp = readdir(dir);
00152        dp;
00153        dp = readdir(dir)) {
00154     const std::string tmp = dp->d_name;
00155     if (tmp.size() >= 5) {
00156       std::string ext = tmp.substr(tmp.size() - 4, 4);
00157       toLower(&ext);
00158       if (ext == ".csv")
00159         dics->push_back(create_filename(path, tmp));
00160     }
00161   }
00162   closedir(dir);
00163 #endif
00164 }
00165 
00166 bool toLower(std::string *s) {
00167   for (size_t i = 0; i < s->size(); ++i) {
00168     char c = (*s)[i];
00169     if ((c >= 'A') && (c <= 'Z')) {
00170       c += 'a' - 'A';
00171       (*s)[i] = c;
00172     }
00173   }
00174   return true;
00175 }
00176 
00177 bool escape_csv_element(std::string *w) {
00178   if (w->find(',') != std::string::npos ||
00179       w->find('"') != std::string::npos) {
00180     std::string tmp = "\"";
00181     for (size_t j = 0; j < w->size(); j++) {
00182       if ((*w)[j] == '"') tmp += '"';
00183       tmp += (*w)[j];
00184     }
00185     tmp += '"';
00186     *w = tmp;
00187   }
00188   return true;
00189 }
00190 
00191 int progress_bar(const char* message, size_t current, size_t total) {
00192   static char bar[] = "###########################################";
00193   static int scale = sizeof(bar) - 1;
00194   static int prev = 0;
00195 
00196   int cur_percentage  = static_cast<int>(100.0 * current/total);
00197   int bar_len = static_cast<int>(1.0 * current*scale/total);
00198 
00199   if (prev != cur_percentage) {
00200     printf("%s: %3d%% |%.*s%*s| ", message, cur_percentage,
00201            bar_len, bar, scale - bar_len, "");
00202     if (cur_percentage == 100)
00203       printf("\n");
00204     else
00205       printf("\r");
00206     fflush(stdout);
00207   }
00208 
00209   prev = cur_percentage;
00210 
00211   return 1;
00212 }

00214 bool load_dictionary_resource(Param *param) {
00215   std::string rcfile = param->get<std::string>("rcfile");
00216 
00217 #ifdef HAVE_GETENV
00218   if (rcfile.empty()) {
00219     const char *homedir = getenv("HOME");
00220     if (homedir) {
00221       std::string s = MeCab::create_filename(std::string(homedir),
00222                                              ".mecabrc");
00223       std::ifstream ifs(s.c_str());
00224       if (ifs) rcfile = s;
00225     }
00226   }
00227 
00228   if (rcfile.empty()) {
00229     const char *rcenv = getenv("MECABRC");
00230     if (rcenv) rcfile = rcenv;
00231   }
00232 #endif
00233 
00234 #if defined (HAVE_GETENV) && defined(_WIN32) && !defined(__CYGWIN__)
00235   if (rcfile.empty()) {
00236     char buf[BUF_SIZE];
00237     DWORD len = GetEnvironmentVariable("MECABRC",
00238                                        buf,
00239                                        sizeof(buf));
00240     if (len < sizeof(buf) && len > 0) {
00241       rcfile = buf;
00242     }
00243   }
00244 #endif
00245 
00246 #if defined(_WIN32) && !defined(__CYGWIN__)
00247   HKEY hKey;
00248   char v[BUF_SIZE];
00249   DWORD vt;
00250   DWORD size = sizeof(v);
00251 
00252   if (rcfile.empty()) {
00253     RegOpenKeyEx(HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE, "software\\mecab", 0, KEY_READ, &hKey);
00254     RegQueryValueEx(hKey, "mecabrc", 0, &vt,
00255                     reinterpret_cast<BYTE *>(v), &size);
00256     RegCloseKey(hKey);
00257     if (vt == REG_SZ) rcfile = v;
00258   }
00259 
00260   if (rcfile.empty()) {
00261     RegOpenKeyEx(HKEY_CURRENT_USER, "software\\mecab", 0, KEY_READ, &hKey);
00262     RegQueryValueEx(hKey, "mecabrc", 0, &vt,
00263                     reinterpret_cast<BYTE *>(v), &size);
00264     RegCloseKey(hKey);
00265     if (vt == REG_SZ) rcfile = v;
00266   }
00267 
00268   if (rcfile.empty()) {
00269     vt = GetModuleFileName(DllInstance, v, size);
00270     if (vt != 0) {
00271       char drive[_MAX_DRIVE];
00272       char dir[_MAX_DIR];
00273       _splitpath(v, drive, dir, NULL, NULL);
00274       std::string s = std::string(drive)
00275           + std::string(dir) + std::string("mecabrc");
00276       std::ifstream ifs(s.c_str());
00277       if (ifs) rcfile = s;
00278     }
00279   }
00280 #endif
00281 
00282   if (rcfile.empty()) rcfile = MECAB_DEFAULT_RC;
00283 
00284   if (!param->load(rcfile.c_str())) return false;
00285 
00286   std::string dicdir = param->get<std::string>("dicdir");
00287   if (dicdir.empty()) dicdir = ".";  // current
00288   remove_filename(&rcfile);
00289   replace_string(&dicdir, "$(rcpath)", rcfile);
00290   param->set<std::string>("dicdir", dicdir, true);
00291   dicdir = create_filename(dicdir, DICRC);
00292 
00293   if (!param->load(dicdir.c_str())) return false;
00294 
00295   return true;
00296 }
